oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sitatunga microsatellite DNA genotypes from the Mayanja River area of Uganda, 2015 - 2018
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Boyce, Mark
Warbington, Camille
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Microsatellite DNA genotypes from sitatunga (Tragelaphus spekii) samples collected in the Mayanja River area of central Uganda, 2015-2018.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Medicine, Health and Life Sciences
